description.short: VAP2 mobile app + VAP-DSS backend for domestic violence victim protection with real-time GPS tracking and proximity alerts.
description.medium: Led development of GEOSATIS Victim App ecosystem: VAP2 (KMP mobile app) and VAP-DSS (Spring Boot backend). Features include real-time alarm notifications via GraphQL Subscriptions (1s latency target), emergency video recording with S3 upload, Kafka event streaming, and Firebase Auth. Advocated for GraphQL over unstable Geonitro binary protocol.
